headline: UBS Raises PT on Lam Research Corporation (LRCX) from $95 to $120
summary: Lam Research Corporation (NASDAQ:LRCX) secures a place on our list of the 12 Best Ethical Companies to Invest in 2025. On July 21, 2025, UBS increased its price target on Lam Research Corporation (NASDAQ:LRCX) from $95 to $120, maintaining a ‘Buy’ rating. This revision comes amid growing optimism for the company’s Q4 performance. The analyst […]
